definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

sentences.english: The 10-day National People's Congress is a largely pro-forma affair.
sentences.chinese: 10天的全国人民代表大会很大程度上是一种形式。

sentences.english: The provisions of the preceding paragraph shall not apply to specially convened sessions of the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 临时召集的全国人民代表大会会议不适用前款的规定。

sentences.english: Mr. Wei spoke to reporters on the sidelines of the National People’s Congress there.
sentences.chinese: 魏宏是向报道全国人民代表大会的记者做以上发言。

sentences.english: The right to amendment is vested in the National Peoples Congress.
sentences.chinese: 本法修改权属于全国人民代表大会。

sentences.english: In theory, the commission's chairman is elected by the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 理论上，中央军委主席由全国人民代表大会选举。

sentences.english: A proposal on same-sex marriage was submitted to the National People's Congress, China's top legislature body.
sentences.chinese: 同性婚姻议题被呈交全国人民代表大会。

definition: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

related.word: 中国人民政治协商会议

definition: national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
pinyin: quan2 guo2 dai4 biao3 da4 hui4

definition: common program/formal program of the communist party after 1949, that served as interim national plan
standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Jun1 shi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: plenary session of the Central Committee
general congress/meeting of the whole committee
third plenum of a national congress of the Chinese Communist Party
